description: A heart warming pasta bake with plenty of creamy vegetables is a comforting dinner
name: Artichoke Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g artichokes, store bought jar and drained
1 large red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta as per pack instructions in salted water and set to one side which should take about 15 minutes.
Pan fry the carrots, onions, garlic and leek in a large pot with the canola oil on a medium heat for 5 minutes while stirring.
Add the mushroom and artichokes to the pot and cook for a further 3 minutes.
Add the sauce to the pot and allow to simmer for 10 minutes or until the sauce begins to thicken.
Add the cooked pasta and sage to the pot and cook for 2 minutes while ensuring everything is combined fully.
Transfer the contents to an oven proof dish and cover with the parmesan and breadcrumbs evenly.
Bake in the oven for 15 minutes and then remove from the heat.
